articles.author: Genevieve Sarah Loh
articles.description: "As a Southeast Asian woman, being able to have our first Disney princess be inspired by my culture and my people? I feel like that's a huge move in the right direction," said Adele Lim, who also penned Crazy Rich Asians.
articles.title: Meet the Malaysian woman behind Raya And The Last Dragon - CNA

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.content: Sisu, the dragon in Disneys newest animated feature, Raya and the Last Dragon, doesnt breathe fire. Shes snake-like and blue-tinted, more furry than scaly, and more interested in making friends than … [+5174 chars]
articles.description: Raya and the Last Dragon’s dragon Sisu, voiced by Awkwafina, reminds many of Elsa from Frozen. But screenwriters Qui Nguyen and Adele Lim, along with Kelly Marie Tran, weigh in on the little details that the character unique and the film feel authentically So…
articles.title: Raya and the Last Dragon’s dragon melds Southeast Asia culture with Disneyness - Polygon
